original_text: That they have committed adultery, and blood is in their hands, and with their idols have they committed adultery, and have also caused their sons, whom they bare unto me, to pass for them through the fire, to devour them.
korean_text: 그들이 행음하였으며 피를 손에 묻혔으며 또 그 우상과 행음하며 내게 낳아 준 자식들을 우상을 위하여 화제로 살랐으며

sentences.original_text: and blood is in their hands
and with their idols have they committed adultery
and have also caused their sons
to pass for them through the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위해 불길 속으로 지나가게 하고
